scripts.postinstall: yarn run --silent prepare:arbitrum && yarn run --silent codegen
scripts.test: yarn run --silent test:lint && yarn run --silent test:graph
scripts.deploy:all: yarn --silent prepare:arbitrum && yarn --silent deploy:arbitrum && yarn --silent prepare:optimism && yarn --silent deploy:optimism
scripts.prepare:arbitrum: mustache config/arbitrum.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/arbitrum.json src/config.template.ts > src/config.ts
scripts.prepare:optimism: mustache config/optimism.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/optimism.json src/config.template.ts > src/config.ts
scripts.publish:arbitrum: 0xgraph remove beefyfinance/clm-arbitrum && sleep 10 && 0xgraph create beefyfinance/clm-arbitrum && yarn --silent codegen && 0xgraph build && sleep 5 && 0xgraph deploy beefyfinance/clm-arbitrum --version-label=v0.0.1
scripts.publish:optimism: 0xgraph remove beefyfinance/clm-optimism && sleep 10 && 0xgraph create beefyfinance/clm-optimism && yarn --silent codegen && 0xgraph build && sleep 5 && 0xgraph deploy beefyfinance/clm-optimism --version-label=v0.0.1
